DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim research compare efficacy safety treatment NPH insulin insulin detemir . You treat either insulin detemir NPH insulin twice daily basal insulin . Additionally receive insulin aspart bolus insulin
DOC.brief_title: Comparison NPH Insulin Insulin Detemir Children Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Insulin detemir naive Type 1 diabetes least 12 month HbA1c lesser equal 11.0 % Significant concomitant disease
